name: You Must (itch)
description:
Year 0, Month 7, Day 19

You wake up.                                                                                                        You are unable to remember how long it has been.                            You must leave.

If only it were that easy.

You Must is a short text-based horror adventure game about escaping your home. Playtime will last from 15-60 minutes, depending on how fast you read and how quickly you find items.

If you encounter any bugs, spelling errors, or glitches while playing this game, please be sure to comment them below and I'll do my best to sort them out!

Sounds used from SPANAC: https://www.freesoundslibrary.com/summer-night-ambience/

Cover Art by moonfruit_#3425 on Discord.

Game by DeeDave

If you create a video of the game, please link it to me.
